DOC.brief_summary: To compare kinetics efficacy two functionally different diagnostic agent , Lymphoseek ( CD206 receptor target ) 99mTc-SC ( Sulfur Colloid non-specific mapping agent ) intraoperative lymphatic mapping ( ILM ) Sentinel Lymph Node Biopsy ( SLNB ) .
DOC.brief_title: Sentinel Lymph Node Biopsy Findings Patients With Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Single center , blind , randomize , parallel-group , comparative study Lymphoseek 99mTc-SC preoperative intraoperative detection lymph nodes subject know breast cancer . All subject receive single dose 50 Î¼g Lymphoseek radiolabeled 0.5 mCi Tc 99m 0.5 mCi 99mTc-SC . Subjects may also receive 1 mL vital blue dye ( VBD ) companion ILM agent . All radio-labeled agent administer single intradermal injection .
DOC.criteria: The subject must female 18 year age old . The subject must preoperative clinical Tis , T1 , T2 , T3 , T4 , well clinical N0 clinical M0 breast cancer The subject must diagnosis primary breast cancer . The subject must candidate surgical intervention , either lumpectomy SLNB mastectomy SLNB , treatment breast cancer . The subject must Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status Grade 0 2 The subject must provide write informed consent Health Insurance Portability Accountability Act ( HIPAA ) authorization participate study The subject clinical radiological pathologic evidence metastatic cancer , include abnormal enlarged clinical palpable lymph node core biopsy/surgical biopsy/fineneedleaspiration evidence malignant cell within lymph node . The subject know hypersensitivity vital blue dye ( VBD ) case vital blue dye plan use SLNB . The subject positive pregnancy test lactating . The subject prior surgery indicate breast axilla .
